g.text: One moonlit coding session at a time ‚ú®
Started as a designer, fell in love with bringing ideas to life
Realized code is just another creative medium ‚Äî more powerful
Creative Director by day, building the future by night ‚Äî
Everything changed ‚Äî now I build for her future and the world
she'll inherit. Every line of code carries that weight.
"The best code I've written is the smile on my daughter's face"
‚ö†Ô∏è Response time: Toddler-dependent ‚Ä¢ üåô Best reached during nap time
